info.name: Audio converter
info.summary: Convert audio within the web interface
info.description:
Convert audio within the web interface
* **Features:** * Audio Conversion * Optionally overwrites files
* **Requirements:** * FFmpeg
* **Note:** * Does not currently support conversion with encryption enabled * This app is based on PaulLereverend's Video Converter app https://github.com/PaulLereverend/NextcloudVideo_Converter
